content.rendered:
Pre-Wedding

  • ACCOMODATION AND VENUE SELECTION
  • INNOVATION INVITATION CARD
  • STATIONARY DESIGN & PRINTING
  • ACCESSORIES & BEAUTY CONSULTANTS
  • PACKGING & ROOM HAMPERS

  • RITUALS & CEREMONIES PLANNER
  • MENU PLANNING | F & B SERVICES
  • BRIDAL SHOWER | BACHELOR PARTY

Wedding Day

  • LOGISTICS
  • HOSPITALITY
  • CHOREOGRAPHY
  • TECHNICAL SOUND & LIGHTS
  • DECOR
  • PHOTOGRAPHY AND VIDEO
  • BABYSITTING AND KIDS ZONE
  • PYROTECHNICS & FIREWORKS

Post-Wedding

  • FIRST NIGHT
  • WEDDING DECOR
  • CAR DECOR
  • HONEYMOON
  • GATEWAYS
